# This file is generated automatically by configure.js.

XMLSEC_VERSION_MAJOR=1
XMLSEC_VERSION_MINOR=2
XMLSEC_VERSION_SUBMINOR=11
BASEDIR=..
XMLSEC_SRCDIR=..\src
APPS_SRCDIR=..\apps
BINDIR=binaries
WITH_CRYPTO=nss
WITH_DEFAULT_CRYPTO=nss
WITH_OPENSSL=0
WITH_OPENSSL_VERSION=
WITH_NSS=1
WITH_MSCRYPTO=0
WITH_LIBXSLT=0
WITH_ICONV=0
WITH_NT4=1
DEBUG=0
STATIC=1
WITH_DL=0
PREFIX=saidas
BINPREFIX=$(PREFIX)\bin
INCPREFIX=$(PREFIX)\include
LIBPREFIX=$(PREFIX)\lib
SOPREFIX=$(PREFIX)\lib
INCLUDE=$(INCLUDE);.
LIB=$(LIB);.
